resources.string: A sweet, elongated fruit with yellow skin and white flesh that is high in potassium and commonly used in smoothies and baked goods.
A brightly colored fruit with a tough exterior and white, juicy interior speckled with black seeds used in salads and smoothies.
Grapes are a type of fruit that grow in clusters of 15 to 300, and can be crimson, black, dark blue, yellow, green, orange, and pink.
A small, fuzzy fruit with green flesh that is high in vitamin C and fiber, used in salads and smoothies and eaten as a snack.
A sweet, juicy fruit with a yellow-orange flesh that is high in vitamin C and fiber, smoothies and eaten as a snack or in salads.
The papaya, or pawpaw is the plant species Carica papaya, one of the 21 accepted species in the genus Carica of the family Caricaceae.
The pineapple is a tropical plant with an edible fruit ; it is the most economically significant plant in the family Bromeliaceae .
